trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> objects used by the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> to override the default way it serializes a class.

The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> is returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class.

By using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> class and the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class, you can override the default way that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes"></xref> class.
Adds an <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> to add.
The zero-based index of the newly added item.
Determines whether the collection contains the specified object.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> to look for.
`true` if the object exists in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes"></xref>, or a portion of it to a one-dimensional array.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> array to hold the copied elements.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
Gets the index of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> whose index is being retrieved.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref>.
Inserts an <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> into the collection.
The zero-based index where the member is inserted.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> to insert.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
index is not a valid index in the .
The property is set and the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes"></xref> is read-only.
Removes the specified object from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute"></xref> to remove from the collection.
